website_summaries.verdict: Stylish, attractive, and loaded with features – a beautiful Citizen watch that any man would be proud to wear for almost any occasion, from work to play.
pros: Exceptional titanium craftsmanship with a host of features that includes chronograph style, sub dials and date window, perpetual calendar, and Japanese quartz movement
Water resistant to an impressive 660 feet
cons: Some of the functions are small and difficult to read
The clasp has been known to come unfastened unintentionally
It's challenging to learn how to use all of the features

website_summaries.verdict: An attractive titanium watch by a trusted timepiece manufacturer that's packed with features and cutting-edge technology.
pros: Solar-powered battery means no winding or replacing batteries
Will recharge in natural and artificial light
Atomic clock technology is highly accurate
Feels lightweight and comfortable on the wrist
Crystal is anti-reflective and resists scratches
Resists water to a depth of 660 feet
cons: Some issues with pins in the band links falling out have been noted
A few of the readouts on the face are quite small

customer_reviews.title: Great for those with OCD about accuracy.
customer_reviews.text: Took me a while to warm up to this watch because of the busy dial, but now I absolutely love it. Wouldn't sync to the radio tower (I'm in LA) until I left it face down overnight near a window with the 6 o'clock facing towards Colorado. If you think it's light and comfortable it's even more so on a leather band. Picture is of a TechSwiss Heavy Leather 24mm.
customer_reviews.author: "darrelherbert"

customer_reviews.title: Atomic Timekeeping Does Not Work
customer_reviews.text: I want to like this watch. It is very light, it looks good, and I like the Eco-Drive. But it has not been able to sync up with the atomic clock radio signal, which is the only reason to pay a premium price for this. Maybe my location on the east coast is too far away, maybe the watch is defective. Either way it looks like a wast of money. Other options with perpetual calendars cost far less, and work as intended.
customer_reviews.author: Brian J.

customer_reviews.title: No User Guide!  No warranty!  No confidence!
customer_reviews.text: I love the way this watch looks and feels. Why the two star rating? Because I have no idea what it does. The box did not include a User Manuel or User Guide. I went to the help site and it does have those there but you can’t download them. Poor job Amazon as this make me question if this is a resell. I hope the watch doesn’t break because the warranty information was conspicuously left out as well. The unboxing of this watch was a considerable let down.
customer_reviews.author: Gillian

customer_reviews.title: Amazon sends used merchandise as mew
customer_reviews.text: Watch no functioning sent in open box not new I paid for a new watch
customer_reviews.author: ojoprieto

customer_reviews.title: Nice watch, very cheap strap
customer_reviews.text: The watch itself is nice, appears to have a very good finish. Works well, has many function, including time zones, which is really good for me as i travel a lot. however the titanium strap is very disappointing. appears and has a feel of a cheap knockoff watch. Like really really cheap, makes noises when you wear it. My $200 tissot had much much better strap. very disappointed with the strap to an extent that i wanted to return the watch but then decided to keep it as the functions are really good. I wish citizen would pay attention to the whole watch and not much the Case.
customer_reviews.author: H R

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware Used watch and missing Manual
customer_reviews.text: I already knew it from the shape of the watch box. Once I open the watch I knew it was used right away by the stickers and protective tapes falling off. Also, the watch's manual was missing from the box. I am returning this watch.
customer_reviews.author: An

customer_reviews.title: Looks used.
customer_reviews.text: I was very dissatisfied with this product. It came and the box was crushed, the watch itself had no protection on the screen face and the protection along the wrist was peeling off. It felt used and not new.
customer_reviews.author: Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: Precision timepiece with a few flaws
customer_reviews.text: This is the most expensive watch that I have ever owned; It looks great, feels great (after I sized the band to fit). This is a precision timepiece with a high quality details and finish. The automatic radio controlled time setting works great. Solar power functions as expected. However, this is not a perfectly designed wristwatch. Many features on the face of this timepiece are too small or too reflective to see in most ambient light conditions. Changing modes from time to chronograph is a bit awkward. Setting the alarm time is tedious. One does get used to the shortcomings, and I ended up enjoying this watch very much.
customer_reviews.author: H. L. B.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing top notch watch! Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Well worth every penny. It’s insane how lightweight this watch is titanium. Like it’s lighter than my g shock watches. Way lighter than my Citizen Nighthawk. Doesn’t come with any documents in the box but the presentation is nicer than most of the citizen watches. Sapphire crystal. Check! Titanium watch so light that you will forget that you are wearing it. Check! Unbelievable price for such a nice watch. Check! Don’t hesitate get yourself one or buy it as a nice gift you won’t be disappointed. Lume is nice as well. What you would expect from citizen. Top notch. Hard to beat for the money!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just a tad heavier than a titanium watch should be
customer_reviews.text: I do like this watch. It is sharp and the radio time update function worked fine from the east coast. It is my third Titanium watch and although it is (I am sure) lighter than one with a stainless band, it is a bit heavier than I expected. I guess all the circuitry and machinery to do all that magic adds the weight. BTW don't be fooled by that 'List Price'. No one sells it for $750. I got it for $239.99 on deal of the day.....
customer_reviews.author: Charm City Dave

customer_reviews.title: an expensive paper weight  looks good though
customer_reviews.text: bought it December 20 2018 stopped working after the return expiration 1/31/2019, total mess Works when it wants to, second-hand goes 1.5 tried calling customer support extension does not exist. thanks, Citizen i used to love you.
customer_reviews.author: Dante

customer_reviews.title: Poor chronograph design
customer_reviews.text: Likes: Eco-drive and atomic synchronization. Lighter weight with titanium. Cons: Strap fit - removing two links was too little. Three too much. Chronograph - It's simply impossible to get an accurate representation of the time elapsed from this chronograph. The dial for minutes is very small. 0-60sec ok, 38mins 43secs not ok. That's it. A solid watch with no chronograph
customer_reviews.author: phbills

customer_reviews.title: The Best Watch I've Owned
customer_reviews.text: I have had a number of Seiko watches and also some Swiss watches, but this watch is fantastic. First of all its very nice looking and well made. Its titanium so its very light in the weight department. Eco Drive, never needs a battery and the Atomic Clock sync makes this watch on time to within less than a second off. Never needs to have the time adjusted, syncs with the atomic daily. If accuracy, looks and well made is what you are looking for with a watch, this is the best choice.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Hes

customer_reviews.title: Great Looking watch with cool technology.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very stylish watch. I watch face could be considered a bit busy, but i love the look and blue accents. The solar powered and radio synching mean you really never have to worry about changing the battery or setting the time. It's amazing. Since the watch is made out of titanium it is very light. Since it is also made out of titanium it comes with the downside that it is a bit easier to scratch than a stainless steel watch. This is why I took one star off. This isn't really a fault of Citizen, but just a downside of going with a titanium watch, you sacrifice increased wear and scratches for lightness.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew James

customer_reviews.title: Beauty and a featherweight
customer_reviews.text: A beautiful watch, made of titanium, it feels like a featherweight compared with other, comparably sized Citizen eco drive watches I’ve purchased made of stainless steel. I could not figure out how to adjust the time in Europe outside of London + one hour in most of continental Europe), so that may be a consideration. A year later, I wear this watch almost every day, and I love it. It is amazing to see it adjust itself right out of the box to the exact time.
customer_reviews.author: Domenic del Molise

customer_reviews.title: My favorite watch yet.
customer_reviews.text: I do industrial type work and have been using this everyday for six months. Cheap light duty watches last me six months or less, heavy duty ones two years. So far there are some light scratches on the bracelet but not one on the Safire crystal. PRO=Safire crystal, titanium light weight, thin and comfortable, tougher than most, good looks. CON= kind of hard to read, but you get used to it, forget about the alarm and timer the beeper is not loud enough to hear in a library. Lamination last about 5 minutes. Best feature of all is that it resets the time every night to the atomic clock.
customer_reviews.author: J Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't be happier
customer_reviews.text: This watch is lightweight but sturdy thank to the use of titanium instead of steel. The blue accents are subtle but add a beautiful hint of color. The settings couldn't be any easier, and the sapphire face is still scratch-free after several weeks of daily wear. The hands glow beautifully in the dark, without being too bright. The only downside is that the case is rather thick, so it can be difficult to wear under slim fit dress shirts.
customer_reviews.author: Seth Cutter

customer_reviews.title: watch works great
customer_reviews.text: i love this watch, low rating because it came from amazon in an unusual box(compared to past citizen purchases) with no tag/paperwork. i had to look up the manual online. for this price, they should have included it. it was wrapped in plastic and looked okay so i wont go through the hassle of exchanging. hopefully mine is a legitimate piece. so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Brent P

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny, all titanium.
customer_reviews.text: Had this for about 6 months now. I'm a watch guy and was looking for one to replace my 14 year old Seiko Wired titanium which I can't get the band or parts for the band anymore. This watch is great and super light. The instructions are pretty straightforward and setting the watch is too. On the fence about purchasing a second one, to have as a backup, (Need to run it by my wife first). Hard to find an affordable all Titanium watch these days, there are not many out there.
customer_reviews.author: Maximus

customer_reviews.title: Extremely nice looking watch at a great price
customer_reviews.text: It arrived right on time. More importantly, I like the fact that it is scratch resistant, is charged by sunlight and artificial light; therefore, recharges continuously and will never need a battery change, is accurate and has the ability to be updated daily via an atomic signal, and is waterproof up 660 ft in water. I wear it anywhere, everywhere and for any occasion!
customer_reviews.author: William Henry

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this watch!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality, with the features I wanted! It was easy to set up, it's easy to use. I've only had it about a week, so the longevity remains to be seen, but Citizen extended the 5-year warranty to 6 years as a thanks for registering my watch with them, which was nice. This is my second Citizen Eco-Drive. My first was still running strong when my 2-year-old threw it away. I had only replaced the clasp on the band in all that time. I expect the same for my new Citizen.
customer_reviews.author: J. Mann

customer_reviews.title: I Love This Watch!
customer_reviews.text: I own lots and lots of watches and really didn't need another but this one checks off all of my boxes. Classy enough to use as a dress watch yet sporty enough to use as a casual watch. Beautiful and classy enough for a date-night watch. It's also one of three Eco-Drive (solar) watches in my collection that also have the ability to set themselves to the national atomic clock every night and that also has a perpetual calendar - meaning that the calendar will not need adjusting for month length and leap years until the 2090s. I have lots of solar watches and several solar-atomic watches but this one checks off all the boxes. It's also deal on accurate.
customer_reviews.author: DangFineGuy

customer_reviews.title: Great watch
customer_reviews.text: Great watch, very light and with a lot of features, I love the atomic sync which makes this watch an impressive accurate timepiece, also the sapphire and titanium make this watch an every day beater. I like the size and the feel of the watch, very comfortable and looks modern, another big advantage is the perpetual calendar. One negative point is that watch hands are very slow and if you want to aet up an alarm and have to jump several hours it takes forever to spin around, in this point casio with easy access feat are way more practical.
customer_reviews.author: JVivies

customer_reviews.title: The lightweight titanium and lug shape make this comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I like the titanium, the sapphire, the radio time sync, perpetual calendar and the day meter. I don't like the chronometer because it only reads to full seconds. The chronograph minute scale crams a full sixty in a tiny scale. They're too hard to read accurately so mostly useless. The sixty minute capability of the chronometer is compromised by the fact it will reset to zero at sixty. Give me a thirty minute scale that keeps going any day. The alarm is very faint. Why bother.
customer_reviews.author: Steve K

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch
customer_reviews.text: All my previous watches were quartz with batteries. At some point I stopped wearing as I was not in the mood to go to a jeweler to change the battery. I gave my wife a nice eco-drive as a gift about 10 years ago and it still looks like new so I decided to buy one for myself when Amazon had that low discounted price for it. Watch looks fantastic, it is light, it immediately synchronized itself to NYC time. If it serves me as well as my wife's eco-drive as worked out for her that will be great.
customer_reviews.author: Undecided

customer_reviews.title: It works as advertised, replaced a Seiko Orange diver ...
customer_reviews.text: It works as advertised, replaced a Seiko Orange diver that took me 3 and a 1/2 years to kill wearing 24/7. So far it syncs at night. Only thing was that the date window could have been a little larger and I wish that Sunday was in red not blue, but the Titanium is blue. It seems to be resting scratch's on the band and crystal that the Seiko was showing. Of course wearing while welding will put some divots in a regular crystal and more time will tell how well it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: AnSharn Harrigan

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expect from Citizen, but quite adequate for occasional wear.
customer_reviews.text: The band broke after 2 days. Assembly, not material. Citizen has really gone downhill over the years. This watch has pretty cool functions, but they should put more attention into a quality build, in my opinion. I'm not sure this is a reputable version though. Maybe citizen just sells the watches that fail quality control on Amazon. Even if so, it speaks poorly of the company. I'm sure I'll be happy with a different band. Titanium or not, it shouldn't be this poorly made. I hope the watch itself doesn't meet the same fate.
customer_reviews.author: Some dude...

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic watch!  Love the Radio controlled time.
customer_reviews.text: This is a terrific watch. Looks and fits great, and the Atomic clock setting the time every night is the bomb. You do need to set it in a window at night facing Boulder. CO where the Radio signal is from (in the US) to insure reliable connection. Being accurate to a second a day and never having to set the calendar is huge for me. I wiould recommend tghis to anyone who likes the look.
customer_reviews.author: agile_one

customer_reviews.title: Great looking, solid watch
customer_reviews.text: I really like the look of this watch, but continued to fret about the price even after I received it. It was indeed a gorgeous piece, but I ended up returning it. I just don't need to impress anybody that much at this point in my life, and a watch is not really a necessity for me either. If in the future I feel like I can spend this kind of money on a watch, I will be getting this one again and keeping it.
customer_reviews.author: mfrazier

customer_reviews.title: I suspect this was not a brand new watch
customer_reviews.text: Watch came out of the box completely dead with no plastic covering on crystal or the back. Plastic on band was loose and falling off. Was going to return it, but decided to put it in sunlight to charge the batteries and see if it worked okay. Got it working, but found that the reference positions were way off, so the watch would not set properly from the atomic clock signal. I'm guessing someone had trouble setting the watch, messed up the settings, and returned it. I got it on sale, so I'll give it a shot. Otherwise, the watch is in good condition and is keeping proper time.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Great watch
customer_reviews.text: Great watch and quality for the price. Pros: -Sturdy -Quality build -Sapphire doesn't seem to scratch easy -Lighter than stainless steel watches -fits good Cons: -The titanium band seems to scratch on the bottom when resting and moving on a desk -hand motion isn't exact click to the next second mark Overall this is a great watch for the price, first citizen watch I have owned and impressed with the quality.
customer_reviews.author: MallOfChina

customer_reviews.title: PREMIUM QUALITY WATCH
customer_reviews.text: Great Watch. Properly packed and promptly shipped. I have a citizens titanium from 9 years ago and this new one is head and shoulders much better. It is atomic sync time and much lighter and better finished than my old one. The only complaint is that when it was time to adjust the band for my wrist, I found that the links did not use the spring loaded pins, like the old one. It required a special tool to press them out and hammer back in. Amazon had the tools and same day shipped them so I am not going to deduct a star for a manufacturers design decision and not a suppliers procurement process, which was flawless.
customer_reviews.author: STEVE PHILLIPS

customer_reviews.title: Watch for sleeves when adjusting the band
customer_reviews.text: Love the watch, the light weight band does take getting used to coming from a heavy steel watch. For those with band issues, these bands have small (3-4mm) sleeves in the pin hole that hold the pin in the link. When you resize the band, make sure you catch the sleeve when you push out the pin. If you don't replace the sleeve, the pin will fall out of the link and the watch will fall off. Odd way to hold the pin, but there you go. I really like the ease of setting the time zone in the US, and the perpetual calender is sweet! Great looking timepiece!
customer_reviews.author: J.D. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Love Citizen Watches!!
customer_reviews.text: UPD: 7/9/2020 Took 1 star off for not having any manual in the box. However, it is still a great watch! ---Original Review--- Citizen makes great watches and these, Titanium Chrono watches with Eco-Drive, are great looking and very functional! These watches are very light and I barely feel them on my wrist! In addition, they keep the exact time by syncing with the Atomic clock in Colorado.
customer_reviews.author: I. Gadget

customer_reviews.title: I received a USED watch
customer_reviews.text: Incredible!! I received a used watch!! This is more than infuriating!! Now I have to go through the process of returning and re-ordering. How TERRIBLE!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Watch
customer_reviews.text: I waited a month before reviewing to provide time to actually use this watch. This is the perfect watch for me and was worth the searching and waiting. As advertised the watch will never need a battery and with the atomic time synchronization the watch will always keep almost perfect time. The water proof feature will protect the watch from my carelessness around water. The Titanium band keeps the watch light and durable. So far no scratches which is one of the titanium's weaknesses according to online reviews. I look forward to many years of service with my Citizen Eco-Drive.
customer_reviews.author: Mark A. Carter

customer_reviews.title: Titanium!
customer_reviews.text: Love my new watch. Note that this is the titanium version and to ensure that its the correct model notice the blue accents on the buttons and time zone indicator (as the other version is black and stainless steel). As such the titanium is so light weight even with the size. I do not have large wrists so it is a good statement piece.
customer_reviews.author: David Beckett

customer_reviews.title: Well Worth It! Highly Recommended!
customer_reviews.text: I am a watch lover. Have about 6 for different occasions. Wanted something below $1000 so I researched on google. I saw this on Citizen's website listed for $750! Amazon has it for a great great price. The watch is well worth it. It looks amazing on the wrist, all the functions are very useful, and its very lightweight 'coz it made of titanium. I only wish it had a logo on the crown, I think it would have looked super cool
customer_reviews.author: Aman

customer_reviews.title: It keeps perfect time. It still looks almost brand-new
customer_reviews.text: I have owned this watch for over a year now. It keeps perfect time. It still looks almost brand-new. The glass seems indestructible. There is some scuffing on the band but i am very rough with it. It looks like a high end watch. I would buy it again if I had to!
customer_reviews.author: Billy Toops

customer_reviews.title: Was going to spend a little less for the stainless version but now glad I didnt
customer_reviews.text: My second Citizen eco drive watches. This time I wanted the lighter weight of titanium and the self setting feature of the atomic clock. Watch arrived today and it's really gorgeous. Was going to spend a little less for the stainless version but now glad I didnt. Some say the dial is hard to read and the chronometer is hard to adjust. Maybe they just didn't read the manual because I found everything clear to read and easy to understand
customer_reviews.author: Michael Lecompte

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorite watches so far.
customer_reviews.text: Black Friday steal of a deal. I love this watch. Got it for my birthday. The titanium makes it super lightweight. I worry less about the face because of the sapphire crystal glass. It has been great at keeping time. The face is a perfect size and the features are very handy; not a bunch of extras that I’d probably never use. I’ve received many complements just from the appearance alone. Not sure what the current price is but it’s a steal of a deal if you can ever grab it for even under $300! I love Citizen watches for their Eco-Drive. I never have to worry about a battery dying on me.
customer_reviews.author: Dan & Lisa

customer_reviews.title: I'm a happy man. The watch itself is beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I live in St. Pete, Florida, I haven't had a problem getting the radio signal, it tends to be stronger on the weekends, but as long as it synchronizes at least once a week, I'm a happy man. The watch itself is beautiful, love the titanium variant (not as heavy) with the blue accents.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Gomez

customer_reviews.title: I love my Eco-Drive
customer_reviews.text: I bought the watch because I wanted a "dress watch." This thing checked all of my boxes. It's stylish, it doesn't require any real maintenance, and it keeps the date and time accurate by receiving a radio signal from Colorado. I typically wear it when we go out on the town, or I have formal business meetings. I love my Apple Watch, but it doesn't scream "I'm an adult." Citizen is better quality than a majority of the Chinese dress watches. I would definitely buy this watch again!
customer_reviews.author: M. Trevors

customer_reviews.title: I am disappointed as the watch is ridiculously perfect so much so ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking at that watch online for over a month, read all kinds of comments about it until coming my birthday I decided to offer it to myself: from me to me. I am disappointed as the watch is ridiculously perfect so much so that I don't have anything to do. So perfect that it is annoying; I wanted a challenge but this watch doesn't give me the slightest chance of complaining about anything. I have three other watches at home which I don't even realize they exist as I wear my eco drive all the time. I have had a Cartier before and I do not remember having that feeling, this watch is ridiculously good!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Watch is broken upon delivery.
customer_reviews.text: Well, now I know why this went on sale. It’s broken and won’t set. Received without a charge, so I charged it for 24 hours. Still uncharged. Can’t set. My recommendation if you want a good solar watch, Casio. Works out of the box, takes a beating and keeps working. Never had a problem with my pro-trek. This Citizen arrived broken. May be an anomaly, but delivering a broken product demonstrates lack of Quality Control. What a disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Nearly Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Extremely nice day/date watch, with the huge advantage of never needing a battery. Also perpetual calendar and atomic clock accuracy. Add in waterproof , power check and a bunch of other features for a nearly perfect timepiece. Truthfully, the luminous hands and numbers could be improved. I am happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: arborista

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly Surprised!
customer_reviews.text: I own Swiss automatics such as Hamilton's, Omega's, and Ball's. My favorite being the Ball's with tritium tubes that light up the darkness. All the Swiss watches are COSC accurate though I only paid for a few with this certification. I have owned Seiko's and especially liked the kinetic movements. But I must say that this Citizen is something special. Titanium with perpetual calendar that updates itself and just like the automatics, never needs a battery. I use my Citizen to set my Swiss watches by once a month. It looks absolutely great as an every day watch or out at those rare evening events. You can't go wrong purchasing this watch!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Eugene Lehr

customer_reviews.title: Best watch I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Wear it everyday as an EMT, this thing is the best purchase I've ever made. Set it once and never need to do anything but wear it. Looks fantastic, a reasonable price considering how sturdy it feels. Feels like a lifetime watch, couldn't be happier with this. Battery never fully charges but never stops working. Probably built to work this way. Such a great looking product, my wrist feels empty without it.
customer_reviews.author: dave radigan

customer_reviews.title: This is a must have!
customer_reviews.text: So I've had the PCAT AT-4010-50E since December 26th 2018 abouts.. Had a time finding a jeweler that knew how to take these tiny pins out..that being said be careful if you hear a jeweler banging on your watch tell them to stop. So after the sizing fiasco this watch is super light on the wrist (my left) & super easy to program! It took about 2 months for it to get to full battery & has been there since around Feburary 2018. This watch has been performing well & I'm actually astonished that the face is totally scratchless as it is a daily wearer.. I registered the watch through the Citizen app & got 6yrs warranty!!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Hilton

customer_reviews.title: A watch that has it all
customer_reviews.text: Just bought this to add to my other watch collection but this one turned out to be the best. This is a self-powered watch covered with Sapphire Crystal (Scratch resistant) with a Titanium body (very light) that syncs its date & time automatically every night (atomic timekeeping, USA or London only) and supports all US Time Zones and has alarm too. Oh, and it does have a very beautiful dial in case you didn't notice. You will literally have 0 regrets after making the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: TechGuy

customer_reviews.title: Awful
customer_reviews.text: Item is clearly not new, no user manual and has some sort of super glue all over the side. Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Huss

customer_reviews.title: Very nice watch with awesome features and lightweight.
customer_reviews.text: The watch is amazing. Looks great and has exactly what I wanted in a watch. To be atomic, solar powered, and a mineral crystal glass to prevent any scratches. One of the more important things I've come to value in this watch is its weight. It is very forgiving to your wrist. I have heavier watches that I must take off at work to give my wrist a rest sometimes. With this one I do not, at least it isn't necessary like my othersothers. Citizen titanium is also more scratch resistant than stainless steel. If you're on the fence, get this one.
customer_reviews.author: John Evans

customer_reviews.title: Don't do it!
customer_reviews.text: I've had two eco watches before. The other two were great. This one is a joke, and an expensive one at that. I would give it zero stars, if that were possible. IT TAKES a full graduate course to just set the time on this thing! The stupid thing has a radio signal feature that does not work and can not be turned off. It throws your watch off by ten minutes every couple of days. I can't believe this piece of garbage is made in Japan.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Extremely attractive, and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: This is my new daily wear watch. It's extremely attractive, and is shockingly lightweight due to the titanium band and case. The sapphire crystal is another great bonus for this watch. I already had a kit to do the band link adjustments myself, but there are a number of good quality kits on Amazon that you can find to do yourself without damaging the pins. If you can catch it on sale, it's an amazing value.
customer_reviews.author: Matt L

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Plastic Toy Watch
customer_reviews.text: Looks can be deceiving. Don’t fool yourself, when you unbox this watch, it is nothing but a piece of plastic. It looks cheap and felt like something you would buy at a Halloween costume store. Returned immediately. This watch should be $20
customer_reviews.author: Tamara

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely beautiful watch. I'm very impressed with this incredible timepiece
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful watch. I'm very impressed with this incredible timepiece. I live in Kansas and the watch picks up a "high" signal every night, and is atomically accurate 24/7. I'm a freak when it comes to my watches having the right time, so this is really perfect for me. It fits nice and the links are very easy to take out on your own. Just make sure to perform a link removal in a well lit room and make sure you don't lose the small pin that comes out when a pin is pulled out and make sure to put the small pin back in when putting a link back together.
customer_reviews.author: k hart

customer_reviews.title: First experience with ECO-DRIVE
customer_reviews.text: Just bought it, was unable to adjust band, so I got watch repair kit. Otherwise works good. This watch a bit heavier than my previous Seiko Men's SLC033 (titanium) that I have for over 6 years but it a bit bigger, so all good. Bought it because I didn't like to change battery every 1.5 - 2 years. Will see for how long ECO-DRIVE can run and if it really how they claim: "It recharges continuously in any kind of light to run forever."
customer_reviews.author: Igor Iurchuk

customer_reviews.title: A beautiful time piece that take patience to set up
customer_reviews.text: What a beautiful watch and yes it not your pull the crown set your time push crown back and your done, fallow the instruction or you will think something is wrong with the watch and be somewhere outside for the radio signal, I’m in the island of Manhattan in New York and the best signal I received during the process was low but successful. Extremely happy with the watch
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Very handsome watch
customer_reviews.text: Although I returned it. My near vision isn't that good and really, really hard for me to read the dials without cheaters. So while I love the looks of this watch and got a great deal on it I ended up returning it for something a little simpler and easier to read. However, if you have good eyes for close up you won't be disappointed. I almost kept it just for it's looks.
customer_reviews.author: MarkjinNY

customer_reviews.title: A very nice piece; one deficiency
customer_reviews.text: This is a great looking watch and so lightweight. My second Citizen Titanium in 14 years. The watch performs as expected. The one exception is the alarm sound is very soft. If you want to use this for waking from sleep, forget it; it’s too quiet. Other than that, it’s a very nice piece. Links adjustment is simple DIY.
customer_reviews.author: Uncle Gee

customer_reviews.title: Very Light and Looks Great
customer_reviews.text: Citizen men's Eco-Drive Titanium is really light weight and looks really great. I took 3 stars away due to the poor quality control, which I will update if the outcome is fixed. There is a stain in the weekly dates between Sunday and Monday. Appears to be oil from a finger but it is noticeable when the light shines on it. I have contacted Amazon and the company wants me to send in the watch for servicing with citizen. I wanted a exchange but the watch is out of stock and I want to keep it.
customer_reviews.author: jch85

customer_reviews.title: Amazing value from an authorized retailer
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful watch and an amazing value. Sapphire crystal, titanium case and band, perpetual calendar, atomic clock, etc.... It's also worth noting that this seller (Amazon.com) IS an authorized Citizen retailer. I saw another review/comment that their purchase didn't qualify for a warranty. Just to allay any concerns, I registered my watch this morning and it's now covered under a 6 year warranty. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: kazak

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch I will wear for years to come.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this watch! The quality of the build is beautiful, the automatic sync with the atomic clock works great. When I check it against my phone, they are both in sync to the second. The Titanium makes this a very light watch on the wrist, and at times you can forget you are wearing it. The Chrono and Tach both work well although the stopwatch on your phone is probably all you would ever need. Citizen has won me over with this watch, it will not be the last one I buy.
customer_reviews.author: Joeface

customer_reviews.title: Best watch I have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: In order to use this watch, one has to be patient and smart (not that I'm calling myself smart) but this is real genius. I'm already loving this watch. I say patient because you may have to charge it fully before using it. There is a lot to learn from this watch.
customer_reviews.author: Rocky

customer_reviews.title: Very elegant.
customer_reviews.text: I received this watch yesterday as a gift for my boyfriend. It’s amazingly elegant I’m sure he’ll like it very much!. The background color has a brown color not grey as it looks in the picture. Very very pretty. My boyfriend just received his watch yesterday for his birthday he was so impressed by the beauty of this watch! He said he would had picked the same watch.
customer_reviews.author: Yadira Montanez

customer_reviews.title: Says it's the perfect watch. It's the perfect everyday watch
customer_reviews.text: A 1st year anniversary gift for my husband, and he's been giddy about it ever sense. Says it's the perfect watch. It's the perfect everyday watch. From color, to shine, to build. He loves that it charges from the sun, no winding, made out of Titanium so he won't ruin it, and even has radio frequency, so the time will change when we go to England. He also loves that the hands and numbers glow in the dark, so he can tell time in the dark. A must have for a watch lover.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Huang

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money
customer_reviews.text: As for function this watch is pretty amazing. Everything worked as it should and was extremely precise. I cannot fault the watch in this area. I did not care for the band at all. It felt like it was cheaply made and the clasp didn't have a positive feel when latching. I will be returning this watch not because of the band but because the face (42mm) just isn't large enough for my wrist and looks funny when I wear it. I really wanted to love this watch but in the end had to give it back and seek out something a little bit larger to better fit my build.
customer_reviews.author: E. Wilder

customer_reviews.title: Great looking watch... But...
customer_reviews.text: Dead on arrival would not hold a charge. Returned to Amazon. I bought this on sale, Amazon gave a full refund and a voucher to make up the difference, however, the vendor raised the price $25.00 so I passed. Will wait til price drops again, I really like this watch, it is beautiful. I hated to send it back.
customer_reviews.author: Charles van scoy

customer_reviews.title: Simply the best
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been into timepieces most of my life. I love the solar, the titanium case, the perpetual calendar. It has it all. It took a month of trial and error to navigate the manual but it was my slow to learn issue. This is a high end product without the cost. Finally, I found the ultimate watch.
customer_reviews.author: Lidia

customer_reviews.title: Great watch with tons of tech and features built in
customer_reviews.text: If you are like me, you probably researched this watch before considering the purchase. Its really amazing! Radio controlled (re-sets itself every night at 0200 by the atomic clock), chrono, day of week, date, multiple time zones, battery meter, and to top it off its titanium so its extremely lightweight compared to other watches of the same size. Watch (pun intended) some reviews online! It's a great watch.
customer_reviews.author: Jason P

customer_reviews.title: Impressive watch.
customer_reviews.text: The features on this watch are impressive. Eco Drive/atomic clock reading/etc, a sapphire lense and it’s all titanium - meaning very light. The watch feels great on the wrist and looks beautiful. Unbelievable watch. If I had to nitpick and find one thing wrong it would be the crown. It can be a little hard to pull out with real short fingernails.
customer_reviews.author: WESIII

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful watch, MUCH lighter than stainless steel. A little cumbersome to use stop watch and alarm; no timer function. Finally, I wish you could have a little bit finer control over the second hand alignment correction. In my opinion, my second hand is the slightest bit off. I think the price for this watch is a steal for how well it looks.
customer_reviews.author: Dallas

customer_reviews.title: Reset upon arrival and sync by window
customer_reviews.text: Wow. Bought it for my dad but almost kept it 🤣✌️. Do a all reset procedure if arms are off sync due to shipping shock!
customer_reviews.author: Hear

customer_reviews.title: Radio signal reception barely ever works
customer_reviews.text: Nice look, cheap feel, very complicated to reset fully, and the radio signal reception has worked one time out of 5 months and when it did, it set the time wrong. Tried multiple resets and manual radio reception attempts. Finally gave up and did the manual time setting.
customer_reviews.author: ryan_vt93

customer_reviews.title: My favorite watch
customer_reviews.text: I don't have an expensive watch collection but this is my favorite. I have 2 Citizen diver watches but wanted something for dress that still had some fun toys. This met both those requirements while still being Eco friendly. Keeps perfect timing and looks great for dress as well.
customer_reviews.author: Chadwick

customer_reviews.title: All around great watch.
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about this watch, accuracy, functions, ease of use. The AT-1040-50E is the total package. Lightweight titanium, perpetual calendar, atomic timing. I do leave mine on the counter in the bathroom at night. There it always receives the WWV signal at the high level. For me, it is all I was looking for in a watch.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 1 year review.
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing this watch now for an entire year. Still love it. The band will definitely get scratched if you wear this a lot, specifically on the shinier sections and the clasp. I wear this to work almost daily and don't baby this watch, though. I've also never bothered to have it polished/cleaned as it doesn't bother me yet. The black paint has held up great. I know I've accidentally banged it against stuff and I can't really see the two scratches unless I'm really really looking for them. Absolutely no blemishes on the sapphire.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Fake, used, and didn't work
customer_reviews.text: This specific watch appeared to be a fake didn't work, and was in used condition when received. It was extremely disappointing because it was an anniversary gift. I ended up buying the same watch at a jewelry store and the quality contrast was huge.
customer_reviews.author: LS

customer_reviews.title: Nice watch at a good price
customer_reviews.text: This watch is a good deal. The reason for 3 stars is that it came already set and was missing some of the protective plastic coverings on the band/bezel. The watch is fine for me but if it was a gift, I'd be embarrassed to give it. The watch looks fine but the condition it came in makes it appear to be a used or refurbished watch.
customer_reviews.author: G. Owen

customer_reviews.title: ... this watch for about 3 months now and absolutely love it. The radio updating is a very cool ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had this watch for about 3 months now and absolutely love it. The radio updating is a very cool and useful feature(I am in Florida and the signal is typically Medium or Low). I can't say enough about how happy I am with the quality and design of the watch. The only downside is the functionality of the chrono; there are a few steps involved to get to it, but in all honesty, I typically will use the chrono on my phone, so it's really not that big of a deal. I recommend getting a watch link kit along with the watch so you can size it to your wrist.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Great design, great technology!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this watch for 2 things: I wanted to have something working with solar technology, and also wanted a watch to have a solid look. This model has both, I own the watch several months already, still I take a look from time to time at my wrist and enjoy how it looks.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur

customer_reviews.title: A watch exuming prestige.
customer_reviews.text: I love the look and feel of this watch. Just by brandishing its chrome accents exumes refinement and class. I live in the Texas region so I compensated for to still get the benifits of the radio signal feature. Everywhere I go, those that notice the timepiece seem to almost immedietly give me a diffrent glance, if you custom fit this watch, it will look better denoting that you either have the resources to make it yours or that you have the skill to custum tailor your watch appropriatly. In conclusion this watch is a great addition to those looking for class and prestige at an affordable price bracket.
customer_reviews.author: lee

customer_reviews.title: I can't say enough good things. The weight difference is huge
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough good things. The weight difference is huge. I normally end up leaving my watch at home due to it being weighty and in the way. This watch is really comfortable and looks great. Further it's tech makes sense. Every thing you could want in a watch is here. This is my daily wear. Don't get caught up in the autos. They are nice for dress but will quickly annoy you with time loss and bulkyness.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: poor band
customer_reviews.text: looks great but the pins on the bracelet kept coming off. Can't use it even after taking it to a watch shop pins still come loose and band fall off the wrist.
customer_reviews.author: Squatnbear

customer_reviews.title: A beast of a watch.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Looks great, rugged and reliable. The battery died when I had it in a drawer for 6 months but a little sunlight and a manual reset and it was ticking along happily again. Cons: Almost too flashy for daily wear.
customer_reviews.author: Edward K. Engstrom

customer_reviews.title: Works great & I never have to think about it or wonder if it's giving me accurate time
customer_reviews.text: This has been my everyday watch for about a year after selling my Omega Speedmaster, and I really like it - it's completely thought free (charges itself, sets itself, etc...) so I never have to mentally wonder if the time it's saying is actually right or not. The only thing I wish was better was the world time support - I have a hard time with it when travelling to Asia & will usually default to a different watch for those trips.
customer_reviews.author: flav_o_dave

customer_reviews.title: I couldn’t be more happy with it
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this watch with the intent on giving it a try. With the mindset that I’m settling for a watch that’s not a TagHeuer. When it arrived, I couldn’t be more happy with it. It is surprisingly light and the features are great. The instructions are slightly unclear, only because they multiple models in the same booklet. However, they are still navigatable. The charge indicator has yet to read anything lower than 3/4 power, and seems to charge rapidly with any light as advertised. If you’re considering this watch, I highly recommend it. Style, quality and the fact that it’s just a neat watch.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin

customer_reviews.title: Great timepiece and comfortable on the wrist.
customer_reviews.text: Love this watch! Very comfortable on the wrist, and looks great! My only complaint is that the stem is a little difficult for me to grasp and pull. So far I like this one almost as much as my 1970 Bulova Accutron.
customer_reviews.author: ddhartma

customer_reviews.title: Looks pricier, lightweight but tough.. Citizen never disappoints!
customer_reviews.text: From the moment you eyes on this beauty you know you made the right choice! Looks way pricier and with the specs it should be. Sapphire glass, titanium.. Lightweight but tough. Eco drive makes sure you won't have to worry about batteries, or winding or anything.. Just put it on and off you go.. Citizen is always very reliable this will last forever!
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo Rentas

customer_reviews.title: It looks as nice as it is, wear it everywhere, everyday.
customer_reviews.text: I love it! I took two links off of one side and a third off the other side, great fit. Pleased with Titanium lightweight eye candy gorgeous. I lov having the day of the week, and the date, on the dial. The big hands keep telling time while you use the tachymeter/ stopwatch, yes still handy even in the age of Dick Tracy watches
customer_reviews.author: bentlevel

customer_reviews.title: It really is beautiful while not being loud
customer_reviews.text: If you bought this watch you already know the features. I live on the east coast and was nervous that radio controled feature would not work. Well... it does but not really, i might be able to get a signal once a week. In that time frame it is usually maybe a .5 second off before next update. Everything works flawlessly would reccomend. It really is beautiful while not being loud.
customer_reviews.author: Grant

customer_reviews.title: Super nice timepiece
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch and it's my second atomic watch the only thing that I had a problem with was the citizen app wouldn't load on my phone after downloading a PDF was able to properly operate the watch I love it and highly recommend this watch
customer_reviews.author: Mike B.

customer_reviews.title: No tubes for the pins
customer_reviews.text: I got this watch a month ago and right when I get it the links are so loose they're falling apart. I took it to a jeweler twice to fix, and he told me none of the pins have tubes to hold them in place so my band is basically trash and I need a new one. I don't know if this is supposed to be like this or not
customer_reviews.author: Smith

customer_reviews.title: You hardly know that you are wearing it.
customer_reviews.text: This is the third atomic watch that I have. I have been very satisfied with both other versions and wanted this one for a while. Timekeeping has been perfect. Watch updates daily and consistently. I couldn't believe how light this watch is compared to the others. You hardly realize that you are wearing it. These are good looking watches and I have received many compliments on them. I would definitely recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: joe K2_45

customer_reviews.title: Il keep you up to date
customer_reviews.text: First impressions horrible cheap feeling Titanium version. I have a Tag and maurice lacroix and a Momo in Titanium and this watch feels like junk. We shall see. no screen protector. I think it was a return at one time.
customer_reviews.author: TR6vs911

customer_reviews.title: and absolutely love it. Honestly don't use most of the functions
customer_reviews.text: Been wearing this watch daily for over half a year, and absolutely love it. Honestly don't use most of the functions, other than the time and day/date, but just really love how this watch looks and feels. Really appreciate the atomic auto-sync feature, and don't think I'll ever buy another timepiece without it (not that I really need incredibly accurate time, just that it's so convenient not needing to adjust the date every month). This is my first Citizen watch (coming from ~$150 Seikos) and I'm just really glad that I splurged a little and bought myself something nice that I enjoy several times each day.
customer_reviews.author: AFD

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch. One thing I've been noticing in the ...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful watch. One thing I've been noticing in the reviews. Lots of people complain about the stop watch feature only being in seconds. Well that's because it wasn't designed to be used as a stop watch. It's a tachymeter which measures in seconds.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Not brand new
customer_reviews.text: The watch itself is great quality so my review is simply based on the condition that it arrived from the seller. We received our watch scratched on the side and without a manual. My husband is having to YouTube the details. Definitely not what I would expect considering it is a pricey watch.
customer_reviews.author: S. Ambroz

customer_reviews.title: probably not a new watch
customer_reviews.text: the watch is nice and functional, but it is likely not new, more like a display item or a returned one, works well though and if ya need instructions, hit the internet cause you don't get any with the watch.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Penniston

customer_reviews.title: ... time piece for almost a month and I just love it. You have to familiarize yourself to it
customer_reviews.text: First of all I have had this time piece for almost a month and I just love it. You have to familiarize yourself to it, the manual and YouTube help. I live in the Pacific Northwest and I do consistently get a low reading on the Rx signal and the watch is in perfect sinc with NIST. I pulled the band off and put a nato strap on, and wow, it's really light. The complications are teeriff, and I love that it has a sapphire crystal. A handsome watch,and the blue phosphorus hands work better than I thought it would. The only gripe long sleeves with a coat do push a button now and again. Otherwise no regrets.
customer_reviews.author: George o Burdine

product_meta.title: Citizen Eco-Drive Perpetual Chrono Atomic Timekeeping Titanium Watch for Men, AT4010-50E
product_meta.description:
A sporty design combined with superior accuracy results in the Citizen Perpetual Chrono A-T Collection (the PCAT watch), which syncs itself to atomic clocks for ultra-accuracy. This atomic timekeeping watch draws power from any light source through Eco-Drive technology. The Citizen Eco-Drive® Perpetual Chrono Atomic Timekeeping Titanium Watch for Men, featuring a lightweight yet robust titanium link bracelet, has a fold-over clasp with a hidden double push-button closure for easy on and off. This water-resistant timepiece features a chronograph, a perpetual calendar, 12- and 24-hour time, an alarm, a power reserve, a tachymeter, and the day and date. This classic round timepiece automatically charges in natural or artificial light and will never need a new battery. For more than forty years, Citizen’s proprietary Eco-Drive technology has served as the prime example of how the brand is dedicated to the world and to making its environment a better place. A simple yet revolutionary concept, Eco-Drive harnesses the power of light from any natural or artificial source and converts it into energy, eliminating the need for battery replacement, using renewable energy to keep Citizen Eco-Drive watches for men running forever. For over 100 years, Citizen, a pioneer in watchmaking and innovative technology, has promoted excellence and creativity with a deep-rooted respect for craftsmanship.

round



Since its foundation in 1930, CITIZEN has promoted a multi-cultural mindset that fosters excellence and creativity. The very name of the brand conveys a deep respect toward craftsmanship and considered as familiar by citizens the world-over. So as a “citizen” of the world, we bear the responsibility to help cultivate a culture of positive change and on-going evolution through our craft. We take that mission seriously and steadfastly welcome what the future may bring. 

As a true manufacture d’horlogerie, CITIZEN integrates a comprehensive manufacturing process from creating individual components to a watch’s final assembly. It’s an artisan’s approach to watch making based on pushing forward the boundaries of technology and leveraging our experience toward exploring new possibilities. 

One pivotal technological breakthrough was the development of a light-driven watch. CITIZEN pioneered this engineering innovation well ahead of other watch manufacturers as early as 1976, which led to the launch of the highly acclaimed Eco-Drive in 1995. Utilizing electrical power converted from virtually any light source, this extraordinary innovation changed forever the way watches could be powered. Eco-Drive eliminated the need to ever replace batteries, which made it especially beneficial to areas where such specialist batteries were not obtainable. This leveled the field for citizens of virtually every country to be able to experience unrestricted joy of wearing and using a CITIZEN watch. 

The product development policy, “The Fusion of Technology and Beauty,” remains a constant motivation for us to merge cutting-edge technology with perfection of design beauty, which as a consequence inspires people to strive to be their best at any time. 

CITIZEN launches a new campaign in collaboration with Wieden+Kennedy, Better Starts Now. This is the simple belief that no matter who you are or what you do, it is always possible to make something better — and now is the time to start doing it. We believe that better and now are both infinite, and that there is always a next ‘better’ and a new ‘now’ in which you can start pursuing it. It was clear from the onset of this project that we are dedicated to this ideal…not to the past but to the present, and all the way we can improve it. To help communicate this belief to the world we have created a new global CITIZEN brand movie, brand identity and brand website that represents out Better Starts Now philosophy. 



See more

This is the simple belief that no matter who you are or what you do, it is always possible to make something better — and now is the time to start doing it. See more
feature_bullets: SUPER TITANIUM: Made with titanium treated with Duratect, Citizen’s proprietary surface-hardening coating, creating a material 40% lighter and five times more scratch-resistant than stainless steel.

LIGHT-POWERED ECO-DRIVE: Converts any light, whether natural or artificial, into energy. Energy is stored in a permanently rechargeable power cell. The watch recharges continuously in any light to run forever, with no battery changes required, ever.

ATOMIC TIMEKEEPING: Remarkably accurate, with a margin of error of just one second in 100,000 years. This watch receives radio signals from atomic clocks around the world and adjusts the time and date automatically.
PERPETUAL CALENDAR: The date is displayed and automatically set for months ending in 28 ,29, 30 or 31-day months, and is even programmed for leap years through February 2100.
WATER RESISTANT: Water resistant to a depth of 200 m (660 ft). In general, it’s suitable for wearing in the shower, in professional marine activities like swimming, snorkeling and for scuba diving.

CLASSIC GOOD LOOKS: This silver-toned dive watch features a black tachymeter top ring and round guilloche dial with three chronograph sub-dials, a 42-mm titanium case with anti-reflective sapphire crystal, and Japanese quartz movement with analog display.

FUNCTIONS: Atomic timekeeping technology with synchronized time adjustment in 5 time zones; user-defined time in 15 minutes increments (A-TM); a 1-second chronograph measuring up to 60 minutes; luminous hands & markers.

GUARANTEE & 5 YEAR WARRANTY: At Citizen, we stand by quality and craftsmanship. Every Citizen purchase comes with a 30-day money-back guarantee and a 5-year limited warranty so you can be sure your new Citizen timepiece meets your expectations.
